Simulate a brand new data frame (the type of data is up to you) and conduct a statistical analysis in R using 2 variables. Create a basic ggplot that goes with the analysis.

```{r}
## Set up libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggplot2)

data(iris)
glimpse(iris)

regModel <- lm(Sepal.Length ~ Sepal.Width, data = iris)
print(regModel)
summary(regModel)$"r.squared"

regPlot <- ggplot(data = iris, aes(x=Sepal.Length, y=Sepal.Width)) +
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth(method="lm", se = 0.99)

regPlot
```
